mapper.select: SELECT A.ROWNUM , CASE WHEN ROWNUM <= 3 THEN '1' WHEN ROWNUM <= 7 THEN '2' WHEN ROWNUM <= 14 THEN '3' WHEN ROWNUM <= 21 THEN '4' WHEN ROWNUM <= 28 THEN '5' END AS GUBUN , A.* FROM ( SELECT CAL.* , @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM FROM bazzarmall.TB_COMM_CALENDAR CAL , (SELECT @ROWNUM :=0) TMP WHERE 1 = 1 AND BASE_DT_STR >= DATE_FORMAT( NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND BASE_DT_STR < DATE_ADD( NOW(), INTERVAL 27 DAY) ) A ORDER BY A.ROWNUM
